question:
Which among the following agendas were followed by the Moderates of INC?
1. To educate people
2. To raise political consciousness
3. To create collective public opinion on political matters
4. To criticize the government through the press without any violence
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Main agendas of Moderates- To educate people of India. To raise political consciousness. To create collective public opinion on political matters. To criticize the government through the press without any violence.Â
